tasksScreen.DoneButton: Are you sure the task <0>{{text}}</0> is completed?

signInScreen.ErrorGettingAccessToken: Something went wrong obtaining access token

accountScreen.DeleteAccountWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account with all your data?

notepadScreen.CleanButtonWarningTitle: Are you sure you want to clear the notepad?
notepadScreen.CleanNotepadTextRequestError: No internet connection, notepad has only been cleared on your device. To clear notepad on the server turn on the Internet and repeat the request
notepadScreen.SaveNotepadTextRequestError: No internet connection, notepad has only been saved on your device. To save notepad on the server turn on the Internet and repeat the request
